A

Action - Class in actions
A Bullet in board action.
Action(int, String...) - Constructor for class actions.Action
The constructor ensures the number of arguments to the action are correct.
Actionfactory - Class in controllers
A generator for actions depending on the input command.
Actionfactory() - Constructor for class controllers.Actionfactory
 
actions - package actions
 
actions - Static variable in class controllers.Actionfactory
A static map, that maps commands, to the appropriate actions.
ACTIVE_TOPIC_SET - Static variable in class configuration.StringConstants
 
activeClients - Static variable in class controllers.ClientState
Maps clients to threads so we can see everyone who is connected, and also know which client state is ours.
addUser(String, String) - Static method in class model.BulletinBoardIO
Attempts to add a new user to the model.
AddUserAction - Class in actions
An AddUserAction adds a new set of user credentials to the bulletin board.
AddUserAction(String...) - Constructor for class actions.AddUserAction
Takes a username and a password as an argument.
ADMIN_LOGGED_IN_MESSAGE - Static variable in class configuration.StringConstants
 
ADMIN_USER - Static variable in class configuration.StringConstants
 
ALREAD_LOGGED_IN_MESSAGE - Static variable in class configuration.StringConstants
 
AlreadyLoggedInException - Exception in exceptions
Exception to be thrown when logged in user attempts to log in again.
AlreadyLoggedInException(String) - Constructor for exception exceptions.AlreadyLoggedInException
 
ANONYMOUS - Static variable in class controllers.ClientState
 
args - Static variable in class controllers.Actionfactory
 
attemptAdminLogin(String) - Static method in class controllers.LoginController
Attempts to log-in was admin.
attemptAdminLogin(String) - Static method in class model.BulletinBoardIO
Attempts to login the admin user.
attemptLogin(String, String) - Static method in class controllers.LoginController
Attempts to log-in with a username, password pair.
attemptLogin(String, String) - Static method in class model.BulletinBoardIO
Attempts to verify login credentials, returns ID of user if successfull, or an empty string upon failure.
